title: Cane Creek Celebrates its 30th Anniversary Limited Components and Experience Center
content:
This year, Cane Creek turns 30, and to celebrate, they are opening a brand-new Experience Center and launching a limited collection of components in the brand’s signature color, Cane Creek Blue. The Experience Center at Cane Creek will be an open-door space where riders can be fully immersed in the history and evolution of Cane Creek’s products. The space also serves as a retail storefront, demo center, coffee bar, and lounge. The 30th Anniversary Collection of blue and silver components covers a range of the company’s core products from large to small. Quantities of the Anniversary Collection are very limited.

Let’s check it out below!

The Experience Center at Cane Creek

History, Bicycle Culture, Shopping, and Coffee – all of this will soon be on tap at the newly constructed Experience Center at Cane Creek. Located in the Cane Creek factory just south of Asheville, NC, the new Experience Center provides an open door into the company’s rich history. Central to the space is a curated exhibit that documents the history of Cane Creek innovations, featuring examples of every major Cane Creek product over the years.

Sip an espresso while catching a live stage of Le Tour on the big screen. Shop colorful Chroma Studio components for your next bike build. See the evolution of the world’s first gravel fork from early prototype, to 3D-printed models, to finished product. Take a deep dive into the internals of Tigon to see how it effectively combines the benefits of air and coil shocks into one platform.

The Experience Center will also be offering test rides and demos, with the ability to touch, feel, and ride Cane Creek components before you buy.

Cane Creek is planning a grand opening party for Saturday, June 14. All are welcome at this public event! Follow Cane Creek online for details of the event.

Located at 355 Cane Creek Rd. Fletcher, NC, 28732, USA.

Cane Creek 30th Anniversary Collection

The 30th Anniversary Collection is a group of core components, all with eye-catching Cane Creek Blue and silver colorways. Bright dip, dual-stage anodizing on aluminum components, blue anodizing on titanium crank arms, and metallic gloss paint on Invert make these components true collector’s items. Riders can choose to make a statement and cover their bike in the entire matching set or grab just one small piece, like a computer mount or headset top cap, to show their appreciation for the long-standing component brand.

The Cane Creek 30th Collection Includes:

  • Invert Gravel Fork
  • Cane Creek eeWings Cranks
  • eeBrakes
  • 110 Ceramic Headset
  • Hellbender 70 Bottom Bracket
  • GXC Stem
  • Computer Mount
  • 30th Anniversary Top Cap
  • 30th Anniversary Hat, T-shirts, Socks, and Water Bottle

Check out more at Cane Creek.
